parameters.name: AllowExternalTargets
parameters.description:
Specifies whether resources in the resource share can be shared with accounts outside the resource directory. Valid values:

*   false (default): Resources in the resource share can be shared only with accounts in the resource directory.
*   true: Resources in the resource share can be shared with both accounts in the resource directory and accounts outside the resource directory.

parameters.name: PermissionNames
parameters.description: The information about the permissions. If you do not configure this parameter, the system automatically associates the default permission for the specified resource type with the resource share. For more information, see [Permission library](~~465474~~).

parameters.name: ResourceShareName
parameters.description:
The name of the resource share.

The name must be 1 to 50 characters in length.

The name can contain letters, digits, periods (.), underscores (\_), and hyphens (-).

parameters.name: Resources
parameters.description: The information about the shared resources.

parameters.name: Tag
parameters.description: The tags. You can specify up to 20 tags.

parameters.name: TargetProperties
parameters.description:
The properties of the principal.

>  This parameter is available only when you specify an Alibaba Cloud service as a principal.
